Class VideoPanel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--javax.swing.JPanel
                          |
                          +--VideoPanel
public class VideoPanel
extends JPanel

This panel is responsible for displaying video recordings. It contains a combo box for selecting the category. Once a category is selected then a list of video recordings are displayed in a list box. The user can then highlight a recording and get the details.

See Also:

Method Detail

populateListBox

protected void populateListBox()
Populate the list box w/ the categories 
  
    1.  If the selected category is not equal to "----" then
        1a.  Get the video array list from data accessor
    2.  Else create an empty video array list

    3.  If the list is not empty then enable "Clear" button
